definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be indignant (cf. Aram. (rare) z9am blame, & n. zuw9mo0; Ar. tazag=ama onomatop., of roar of camel, angry speech, v. Frey, De on Ps 7:12)—Pf. ´[[ז]] Nu 23:8 + 3 t.; [[זׇעַמְתָּה]] Zec 1:12; Impf. [[אֶזְעׂם]] Nu 23:8; 3 pl. sf. [[יִזְעָמוּהוּ]] Pr 24:24; Imv. [[זׁעֲמָה]] Nu 23:7 (for [[זׇֽעָמֳה]] Ges:§ 64, (2)); Pt. act. [[זׁעֵם]] Ps 7:12; pass. cstr. [[זְעוּם]] Pr 22:14; f. [[זְעוּמָה]] Mic 6:10; —

be indignant, have indignation, of hostile prince [[עַל בְּרִית קוֹדֶשׁ]] Da 11:30; elsewhere of Yahweh, who is [[אֵל זׁעֵם]] Ps 7:12 (‖[[שׁוֹפֵט]]), c. acc. of enemy Is 66:14; cities of Judah Zec 1:12; people Mal 1:4; a man Pr 22:14.

express indignation in speech, denounce, curse ‖[[יִקְּבֻהוּ]] Pr 24:24; ‖[[אֶקּׂב]] and [[אָֽרָה־]] Nu 23:7, Nu 23:8, Nu 23:8 (E); [[זְעוּמָה אֵיפַת רָזוֹן]] Mic 6:10 an ephah of scantiness, denounced, or cursed.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[פָּנִים נִזְעָמִים]] Pr 25:23 face stirred with indignation.
